choices.label: Because <math alttext="0.4 plus x equals 1"><mn>0.4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="y plus z equals 1"><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, the value of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> can be determined, but the values of <math alttext="y"><mi>y</mi></math> and <math alttext="z"><mi>z</mi></math> cannot be determined.
